name: Miami Vice

ingredients.item: parts Giffard Crème de Fraise des Bois liqueur

preparation:
Add all the ingredients except the liqueur into a cocktail shaker with ice, and shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a double rocks glass over pellet ice.
Drizzle the liqueur.
Garnish with a Luxardo cherry skewered with a cocktail umbrella, and an edible orchid.
